mapper.update: update profile_service set profile_id = #{profileId}, co_id = #{coId}, sncode = #{sncode}, spcode_histno = #{spcodeHistno}, status_histno = #{statusHistno}, entry_date = #{entryDate}, channel_num = #{channelNum}, ovw_acc_first = #{ovwAccFirst}, date_billed = #{dateBilled}, sn_class = #{snClass}, ovw_subscr = #{ovwSubscr}, subscript = #{subscript}, ovw_access = #{ovwAccess}, ovw_acc_prd = #{ovwAccPrd}, accessfee = #{accessfee}, channel_excl = #{channelExcl}, dis_subscr = #{disSubscr}, install_date = #{installDate}, trial_end_date = #{trialEndDate}, prm_value_id = #{prmValueId}, currency = #{currency}, srv_type = #{srvType}, srv_subtype = #{srvSubtype}, ovw_adv_charge = #{ovwAdvCharge}, adv_charge = #{advCharge}, adv_charge_prd = #{advChargePrd}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag}, rec_version = #{recVersion}, attrib_histno = #{attribHistno}, attrib_histno_nnp = #{attribHistnoNnp} where profile_id = #{profileId};
